languages.text: "Я никогда не был в лагере — никто из нас не был. Только главный видел человека из штаба: тот пару раз привозил оружие и распоряжения, говорил, что за ним стоит большая сила, чем можно представить... еще говорил, что губернаторские псы поплатятся за карательные операции в поселениях — сами они спрятались где-то далеко от простых людей".

traits.locale_text: "Я никогда не был в лагере — никто из нас не был. Только главный видел человека из штаба: тот пару раз привозил оружие и распоряжения, говорил, что за ним стоит большая сила, чем можно представить... еще говорил, что губернаторские псы поплатятся за карательные операции в поселениях — сами они спрятались где-то далеко от простых людей".

languages.text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."
languages.original_text: "Я никогда не был в лагере — никто из нас не был. Только главный видел человека из штаба: тот пару раз привозил оружие и распоряжения, говорил, что за ним стоит большая сила, чем можно представить... еще говорил, что губернаторские псы поплатятся за карательные операции в поселениях — сами они спрятались где-то далеко от простых людей".

traits.locale_text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

"I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

"I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

"I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

languages.text: 「僕はキャンプに行ったことがないんだ…他のメンバーも。長官だけが基地の人間に会った。その人は何度かやってきて、武器や命令を持ってきた…僕らの想像もつかないほどの大勢力を代表していると言ってました…それと、総督の犬は開拓地にやったことの報いを受ける、とも。でも、奴らは開拓地には隠れてない。長官は役職のないメンバーとは距離を置いてるんです」
languages.original_text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

traits.locale_text: 「僕はキャンプに行ったことがないんだ…他のメンバーも。長官だけが基地の人間に会った。その人は何度かやってきて、武器や命令を持ってきた…僕らの想像もつかないほどの大勢力を代表していると言ってました…それと、総督の犬は開拓地にやったことの報いを受ける、とも。でも、奴らは開拓地には隠れてない。長官は役職のないメンバーとは距離を置いてるんです」

languages.text: “我从没进过他们的营地，没人去过，只有我们的头头见过他们那边的人。那个人来过几次，带来了武器和命令。他说，他身后的力量比我们想象得还要更加强大……他还说，总督的走狗一定会拿定居点开刀，以此报复他们的叛乱行为，但他们并没有藏身在定居点里，他们一直与常人保持距离。”
languages.original_text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

traits.locale_text: “我从没进过他们的营地，没人去过，只有我们的头头见过他们那边的人。那个人来过几次，带来了武器和命令。他说，他身后的力量比我们想象得还要更加强大……他还说，总督的走狗一定会拿定居点开刀，以此报复他们的叛乱行为，但他们并没有藏身在定居点里，他们一直与常人保持距离。”

languages.text: «Nunca he estado en el campamento... ni yo ni nadie. Solo el jefe ha visto a un hombre de la base: vino un par de veces con armas y órdenes, diciendo que representaba a una fuerza que se escapaba de nuestra comprensión... y que los perros de la gobernadora pagarían por meter las narices en sus asentamientos. Pero ellos no se esconden allí; siempre guardan las distancias con la plebe».
languages.original_text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca he estado en el campamento... ni yo ni nadie. Solo el jefe ha visto a un hombre de la base: vino un par de veces con armas y órdenes, diciendo que representaba a una fuerza que se escapaba de nuestra comprensión... y que los perros de la gobernadora pagarían por meter las narices en sus asentamientos. Pero ellos no se esconden allí; siempre guardan las distancias con la plebe».

languages.text: "Ich war noch nie in ihrem Lager – keiner von uns war das. Nur der Häuptling hat mal jemanden aus ihrer Basis gesehen: Er kam einige Male vorbei, brachte Waffen und Befehle – er sagte, er repräsentiert eine größere Macht, als wir uns vorstellen könnten ... und dass die Hunde der Gouverneurin für ihre Unterdrückung der Ansiedlungen bezahlen würden. Aber dort verstecken sie sich nicht – sie halten Abstand von normalen Menschen."
languages.original_text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war noch nie in ihrem Lager – keiner von uns war das. Nur der Häuptling hat mal jemanden aus ihrer Basis gesehen: Er kam einige Male vorbei, brachte Waffen und Befehle – er sagte, er repräsentiert eine größere Macht, als wir uns vorstellen könnten ... und dass die Hunde der Gouverneurin für ihre Unterdrückung der Ansiedlungen bezahlen würden. Aber dort verstecken sie sich nicht – sie halten Abstand von normalen Menschen."

languages.text: « Je suis jamais allé dans leur camp ; en fait, personne y a jamais mis les pieds. Le chef est le seul à avoir vu un type de leur base qui est venu plusieurs fois pour nous donner des armes et des ordres. Il disait qu'il représentait une force militaire plus puissante que tout ce qu'on pouvait imaginer et que les chiens de la gouverneure paieraient cher leurs représailles sur les villages. Mais c'est pas là qu'ils sont cachés, ils restent à l'écart de la population. »
languages.original_text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis jamais allé dans leur camp ; en fait, personne y a jamais mis les pieds. Le chef est le seul à avoir vu un type de leur base qui est venu plusieurs fois pour nous donner des armes et des ordres. Il disait qu'il représentait une force militaire plus puissante que tout ce qu'on pouvait imaginer et que les chiens de la gouverneure paieraient cher leurs représailles sur les villages. Mais c'est pas là qu'ils sont cachés, ils restent à l'écart de la population. »

languages.text: "Kamplarında hiç bulunmadım, hiçbirimiz bulunmadık. Üslerinden bir kişi geldi, onu da bir tek şefimiz gördü. Birkaç kere geldi, silah ve emirler getirdi, hayal bile edemeyeceğimiz büyük bir gücü temsil ettiğini söyledi. Sonra da valinin itlerinin yerleşim yerlerindeki misillemelerinin bedelini ödeyeceklerini belirtti. Ama saklandıkları yerler oralar değil. Sıradan halkla aralarındaki mesafeyi koruyorlar."
languages.original_text: "I've never been in their camp — none of us have. Only the chief saw one person from their base: he came a few times, bringing weapons and orders — he said he represented a greater force than we could imagine... and he said that the governor's dogs will pay for their reprisals in the settlements. But that's not where they're hidden — they keep their distance from ordinary folks."

traits.locale_text: "Ben kampta hiç bulunmadım, hiçbirimiz bulunmadık. Üslerden bir kişi geldi, onu da bir tek şefimiz gördü. Birkaç kere geldi, silah ve emirler getirdi, hayal bile edemeyeceğimiz büyük bir gücü temsil ettiğini söyledi. Sonra da valinin itlerinin yerleşim yerlerindeki misillemelerinin bedelini ödeyeceklerini belirtti. Yalnız yerlerim yerlerinde saklanmıyorlar, insanlarla aralarındaki mesafeyi koruyorlar."
